dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright etc..]
dmca.body:
Nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 11, 2005 10:49 PM
To: knockboots@knockboots.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright etc..]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright etc..
Date: Sat, 9 Apr 2005 07:03:18 -0700
From: knockboots.com <knockboots@knockboots.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>, <bgodfrey@socal.rr.com>, <abuse@asmallorange.com>

Hello We just found one of your clients using a domain name that is a total
rip off of ours. We own www.knockboots.com and www.knockboot.com your client
now owns www.drknockboots.com Today is Sat. Apr 9th 2005 on Mon April 11th
2005 we will be contacting our lawyers and will be filing suit. We are
sending this email out to you and hope we can stop it here instead of going
the legal route! Please let us know how you will be handling this. I thank
you Tom
- ---------------------------------------
Registrant:

bryan godfrey

17740 scherzinger ln #109

canyon country, California 91387

United States

Thomas J Kiser
757-224-2367
http://www.knockboots.com/webmasters
Start making money today Join Knock Boots.



- --
- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCW0UxvK/XpJs6oyURAp/0AJ93OMw1nzPiApXmKlT7eg4oDXnTngCfe/+0
CyAioEptgu5qwFr3BQrDgCY=
=2wZn
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
